dmca.title: Notice of Infringement of Copyright by Operation of www.miimovies.com ("Mi Imovies")
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: June_Leary@mpaa.org [mailto:June_Leary@mpaa.org] 
Sent: Friday, May 18, 2007 3:47 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: Truc_Nguyen@mpaa.org
Subject: Notice of Infringement of Copyright by Operation of
www.miimovies.com ("Mi Imovies")

 

 

 

This is sent on behalf of  Truc-Linh N. Nguyen, Esq.

 

 

 

Please see attached letter (Mi Imovies - ISP.pdf) and enclosure (Mi
Imovies.com.pdf).

 

 

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------

 

Truc-Linh N. Nguyen, Esq.

Counsel, Worldwide Anti-Piracy Legal Affairs

Motion Picture Association of America

15503 Ventura Blvd.

Encino, California 91436

Office:  (818) 995-6600

Fax:     (818) 382-1785

Email:   truc_nguyen@mpaa.org

 

 

 

This message may constitute or contain privileged and confidential legal
advice and/or attorney work product and is to be opened and read only by
the intended recipient.
